Scope and Objective

Hong Kong Quality Assurance Agency (HKQAA) was commissioned by Electrical and

compilation of the data and information of the Report.

Methodology

reviewed based on the following criteria:
• The principles of completeness, accuracy, neutrality, comparability and
responsiveness, as set out in the Institute of Social and Ethical AccountAbility
standard AA1000, and
• The Global Reporting Initiative (GRI) G3 Guidelines.

responsible personnel with accountability for preparing the Report and verifying the selected
representative sample of data and information consolidated in the Report. Raw data and
supportingevidenceof the selected samples werethoroughly examined.
